title: qq313131
author: qq313131
content: "Hash electronic games, endless fun at your fingertips! This thrilling digital game brings you limitless entertainment and challenges. We offer a variety of game themes, including classic fruit machines and modern 3D animation games. Our game interface is simple and easy to understand, with all the features you need to enjoy your gaming experience. Most importantly, our games are safe and secure, ensuring the protection of your personal information and funds. Try our Hash electronic games today and you won't be disappointed!"https://okb99.vip/#/

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I'm not sure I can see any good reason people would transfer money to a complete newbie's website, no matter how shiny it is.You may want to do something to get people start trusting you...Plus: maybe it's just me, but I didn't find any company info on that website.If you indeed want to do a honest business then you may have to do it better than this. However, you can take the advises or ignore them, no biggie.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Tell us more about you before we find out more. Where is your casino registered? Let me guess it is not yet registered because likely you scam to scam.Quote from: NeuroticFish on April 30, 2023, 04:43:17 PMI'm not sure I can see any good reason people would transfer money to a complete newbie's website, no matter how shiny it is.The domain was created just last month. Anyone that pays into any address given by the website will just be scammed.Quote from: NeuroticFish on April 30, 2023, 04:43:17 PMYou may want to do something to get people start trusting you...What scammers will not likely be able to do.

Try our Hash electronic games today and you won't be disappointed!"https://okb99.vip/#/First of all, I wish to welcome you to the bitcointalk forum, the official home of all crypto gamblers and best place to advertise your casino business, because I just noticed you just bought a "Copper Account" and yet to get an ANN thread designer to create a good looking ANN thread for your brand. But I will like to ask some few questions which goes as follows; 1. Are you the owner of the casino or its representative here on the forum?2. What benefits do people stand to gain using your casino which is quite different from others.3. How long have your casino been in the business?4. Does your casino restrict some regions? Because I tried clicking the link provided above and wasn't granted access

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: You are welcome to the forum. I checked the link you provided. The features of the site is very good and simpe. The developers of the site tried. But the domain is under suspicious. It doesn't look like a normal domain name. But what I can say that might make me to believe that you are serious is the copper member account. Yes as NeuroticFish said, the company information is not clear for me as well.Because you are not the first person to come here and a project but your project need more explanation in the forum. As it is I don't think anyone will go there and deposit money and start gambling.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: @OP since you bought a copper membership(which bypasses the restriction for newbies of not being able to post images)you might want to put an image on your ANN thread.site's creation date. take note that even if they are recently created, it does not mean that they are a scam siteQuote from: https://who.is/whois/okb99.vipExpires On2024-03-20Registered On2023-03-20Updated On2023-03-25Quote from: NeuroticFish on April 30, 2023, 04:43:17 PMPlus: maybe it's just me, but I didn't find any company info on that website.I checked it too and couldn't find any info about their company on their website.

comments.author: JooBra
comments.body: Making gambling business is not straight forward. There are many things that need to be shown and competition is really strong. Firstly I know there are strong regulations around online casinos, how you stand with that?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Based on Whois there's a possibility that this is a China-based Casino server is from China it was created only last month I don't like the interface and they also ask you to download wallets that they allowed on their platform with a link on their page https://okb99.vip/#/pages/help/walletRegistWhen it comes to wallet I prefer to download it not coming from a third party, especially to a new site there's a big risk in doing this.

comments.author: entebah
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on April 30, 2023, 09:46:44 PMBased on Whois there's a possibility that this is a China-based Casino server is from China it was created only last month I don't like the interface and they also ask you to download wallets that they allowed on their platform with a link on their page https://okb99.vip/#/pages/help/walletRegistWhen it comes to wallet I prefer to download it not coming from a third party, especially to a new site there's a big risk in doing this.I just check the wallet link and it seems they are redirecting it to the official website.if you watch the video tutorial about how to play it you will hear a video in the Chinese language and I believe this site's customers are mainly Chinese people.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: It is indeed shiny. The logo looks great but seem very familiar. Â Welcome to bitcointalk.Quote from: coin-investor on April 30, 2023, 09:46:44 PMBased on Whois there's a possibility that this is a China-based Casino server is from China it was created only last month I don't like the interface and they also ask you to download wallets that they allowed on their platform with a link on their page https://okb99.vip/#/pages/help/walletRegistWhen it comes to wallet I prefer to download it not coming from a third party, especially to a new site there's a big risk in doing this.When you click one wallet that the site recommends, it will take you to the google playstore to download it. But why is this t recommending a wallet when users need to register?Like they said you wanna build trust here.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: The layout for the site is suitable for mobile phones but not wide enough for laptops or computers. I suggest @OP increase the width of the display on his site to see it wider like the other sites. There's still plenty of time to improve what other friends have suggested so that the site can be even better. And only the games from the Casino and Sports section have no games yet. For other parts, @ OP needs to explain in more detail so there's no more curiosity.

comments.body: Quote from: maydna on April 30, 2023, 10:32:23 PMThe layout for the site is suitable for mobile phones but not wide enough for laptops or computers. I suggest @OP increase the width of the display on his site to see it wider like the other sites. There's still plenty of time to improve what other friends have suggested so that the site can be even better. And only the games from the Casino and Sports section have no games yet. For other parts, @ OP needs to explain in more detail so there's no more curiosity.Yes,Â  very unconventional majority of players feel comfortable playing on their desktop or laptop it feels like you are playing on mobile while you are on your laptop, they should increase the layout to fit the screen for players' convenience, even though OP is already wearing a copper account I still doubt the seriousness of promoting casino that is unconventional on its look.I also notice that they only accept USDT and TRX they have to confirm if they are going to add Bitcoin, which is being used by the majority of gamblers.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: i looked at your casino and i cant find if TOS is licensed so i assume your casino is not licensed so i ask you how do you ensure that the government will not learn about your casino and will not charge you with money laundering? you simply cannot prevent governments from seizing your casino and your customers will suffer because when governments seize a casino they also seize all of the casino and never return those funds to customers, because they don't even care about customers, because in the heads of governments is the idea that all people should not use things without licensesWhy don't you have a license? looking at your casino designer if you realize that you created something fast with the aim of operating fast, then what is the advantage of your casino in relation to the old casinos? why should people stop using old casinos to use your casino? what is your main objective that made you create this casino? bitcoin is the first and biggest cryptocurrency, so most people use bitcoin to play, why did you choose not to put bitcoin but put USDT and tron? I just don't understand how this would be advantageous for your casinoin your casino there is an esport option but it does not work, from what I see you launched an incomplete casino, this is a bad move in the business world, it reveals that you are in a great hurry to make profits, and this is also a big red flag in my opinion, a person when in a hurry easily becomes a scam

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: This service looks sketchy and trustworthy and I will suggest everyone not to make any deposits into this site unless and until the ops make some good clarification on some vital things such as their licensing and who their games providers are and what their send is on KYC. But all the same, time, let me join others to welcome you ops to the forum and you have a Cooper member account already so I don't see why you did not make a professional ANN thread if you are serious about this service you promote here.
